source.srcset: giraffe@0.75x.jpg 300w, giraffe.png 400w, giraffe@1.5x.jpg 600w, giraffe@2x.jpg 800w, giraffe@2.5x.jpg 1000w, giraffe@3x.jpg 1200w, giraffe@3.5x.jpg 1400w, giraffe@4x.jpg 1600w, giraffe@4.5x.jpg 1800w, giraffe@5x.jpg 2000w, giraffe@5.5x.jpg 2200w, giraffe@6x.jpg 2400w, giraffe@6.5x.jpg 2600w, giraffe@7x.jpg 2800w, giraffe@7.5x.jpg 3000w, giraffe@8x.jpg 3200w, giraffe@8.5x.jpg 3400w, giraffe@9x.jpg 3600w, giraffe@9.5x.jpg 3800w, giraffe@10x.jpg 4000w
source.sizes:
(orientation: landscape) and (min-width: calc((7/8 * (100vh - 100px)) + 200px)) calc((100vh - 100px) * 8/7 * 0.7142),
(orientation: landscape) calc((100vw - 200px) * 0.7142),
(min-width: calc(7/8 * (100vh - 200px))) calc((100vh - 200px) * 8/7 * 0.7142),
71.42vw
